item.description:
July Work Party will be at Elaine and Francis' Home in Portland on Saturday the 14th from 9am to 12pm.

What: Workparty to make hoop house like this (see photo in Photo Section) one in Brooks ME
which we recently made during our 2 week permaculture design course. We
will also line this already dug pond (see photo in Photo Section) in our backyard.

When: Saturday July 14, 9:00 am til potluck lunchtime around noon

Where: McGillicuddys at 62 Avalon Rd., Portland, Maine

What to bring: Gloves and food to share

"Come see our rebar grape trellis too." (photo in Photo Section)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: July Work Party: "Help build an Eco-system in Suburbia"
